questions.text:
#### Q1. Partitioner controls the partitioning of what data?

- %OPTION% final keys
- %OPTION% final values
- %OPTION% intermediate keys
- %OPTION% intermediate values

#### Q2. SQL Windowing functions are implemented in Hive using which keywords?

- %OPTION% UNION DISTINCT, RANK
- %OPTION% OVER, RANK
- %OPTION% OVER, EXCEPT
- %OPTION% UNION DISTINCT, RANK

#### Q3. Rather than adding a Secondary Sort to a slow Reduce job, it is Hadoop best practice to perform which optimization?

- %OPTION% Add a partitioned shuffle to the Map job.
- %OPTION% Add a partitioned shuffle to the Reduce job.
- %OPTION% Break the Reduce job into multiple, chained Reduce jobs.
- %OPTION% Break the Reduce job into multiple, chained Map jobs.

#### Q4. Hadoop Auth enforces authentication on protected resources. Once authentication has been established, it sets what type of authenticating cookie?

- %OPTION% encrypted HTTP
- %OPTION% unsigned HTTP
- %OPTION% compressed HTTP
- %OPTION% signed HTTP

#### Q5. MapReduce jobs can be written in which language?

- %OPTION% Java or Python
- %OPTION% SQL only
- %OPTION% SQL or Java
- %OPTION% Python or SQL

#### Q6. To perform local aggregation of the intermediate outputs, MapReduce users can optionally specify which object?

- %OPTION% Reducer
- %OPTION% Combiner
- %OPTION% Mapper
- %OPTION% Counter

#### Q7. To verify job status, look for the value `___` in the `___`.

- %OPTION% SUCCEEDED; syslog
- %OPTION% SUCCEEDED; stdout
- %OPTION% DONE; syslog
- %OPTION% DONE; stdout

#### Q9. To get the total number of mapped input records in a map job task, you should review the value of which counter?

- %OPTION% FileInputFormatCounter
- %OPTION% FileSystemCounter
- %OPTION% JobCounter
- %OPTION% TaskCounter (NOT SURE)

#### Q10. Hadoop Core supports which CAP capabilities?

- %OPTION% A, P
- %OPTION% C, A
- %OPTION% C, P
- %OPTION% C, A, P

#### Q11. What are the primary phases of a Reducer?

- %OPTION% combine, map, and reduce
- %OPTION% shuffle, sort, and reduce
- %OPTION% reduce, sort, and combine
- %OPTION% map, sort, and combine

#### Q12. To set up Hadoop workflow with synchronization of data between jobs that process tasks both on disk and in memory, use the `___` service, which is `___`.

- %OPTION% Oozie; open source
- %OPTION% Oozie; commercial software
- %OPTION% Zookeeper; commercial software
- %OPTION% Zookeeper; open source

#### Q13. For high availability, use multiple nodes of which type?

- %OPTION% data
- %OPTION% name
- %OPTION% memory
- %OPTION% worker

#### Q14. DataNode supports which type of drives?

- %OPTION% hot swappable
- %OPTION% cold swappable
- %OPTION% warm swappable
- %OPTION% non-swappable

#### Q15. Which method is used to implement Spark jobs?

- %OPTION% on disk of all workers
- %OPTION% on disk of the master node
- %OPTION% in memory of the master node
- %OPTION% in memory of all workers

#### Q16. In a MapReduce job, where does the map() function run?

- %OPTION% on the reducer nodes of the cluster
- %OPTION% on the data nodes of the cluster (NOT SURE)
- %OPTION% on the master node of the cluster
- %OPTION% on every node of the cluster

#### Q17. To reference a master file for lookups during Mapping, what type of cache should be used?

- %OPTION% distributed cache
- %OPTION% local cache
- %OPTION% partitioned cache
- %OPTION% cluster cache

#### Q18. Skip bad records provides an option where a certain set of bad input records can be skipped when processing what type of data?

- %OPTION% cache inputs
- %OPTION% reducer inputs
- %OPTION% intermediate values
- %OPTION% map inputs

#### Q19. Which command imports data to Hadoop from a MySQL database?

- %OPTION% spark import --connect jdbc:mysql://mysql.example.com/spark --username spark --warehouse-dir user/hue/oozie/deployments/spark
- %OPTION% sqoop import --connect jdbc:mysql://mysql.example.com/sqoop --username sqoop --warehouse-dir user/hue/oozie/deployments/sqoop
- %OPTION% sqoop import --connect jdbc:mysql://mysql.example.com/sqoop --username sqoop --password sqoop --warehouse-dir user/hue/oozie/deployments/sqoop
- %OPTION% spark import --connect jdbc:mysql://mysql.example.com/spark --username spark --password spark --warehouse-dir user/hue/oozie/deployments/spark

#### Q20. In what form is Reducer output presented?

- %OPTION% compressed (NOT SURE)
- %OPTION% sorted
- %OPTION% not sorted
- %OPTION% encrypted

#### Q21. Which library should be used to unit test MapReduce code?

- %OPTION% JUnit
- %OPTION% XUnit
- %OPTION% MRUnit
- %OPTION% HadoopUnit

#### Q22. If you started the NameNode, then which kind of user must you be?

- %OPTION% hadoop-user
- %OPTION% super-user
- %OPTION% node-user
- %OPTION% admin-user

#### Q23. State \_ between the JVMs in a MapReduce job

- %OPTION% can be configured to be shared
- %OPTION% is partially shared
- %OPTION% is shared
- %OPTION% is not shared (https://www.lynda.com/Hadoop-tutorials/Understanding-Java-virtual-machines-JVMs/191942/369545-4.html)

#### Q24. To create a MapReduce job, what should be coded first?

- %OPTION% a static job() method
- %OPTION% a Job class and instance (NOT SURE)
- %OPTION% a job() method
- %OPTION% a static Job class

#### Q25. To connect Hadoop to AWS S3, which client should you use?

- %OPTION% S3A
- %OPTION% S3N
- %OPTION% S3
- %OPTION% the EMR S3

#### Q26. HBase works with which type of schema enforcement?

- %OPTION% schema on write
- %OPTION% no schema
- %OPTION% external schema
- %OPTION% schema on read

#### Q27. HDFS file are of what type?

- %OPTION% read-write
- %OPTION% read-only
- %OPTION% write-only
- %OPTION% append-only

#### Q28. A distributed cache file path can originate from what location?

- %OPTION% hdfs or top
- %OPTION% http
- %OPTION% hdfs or http
- %OPTION% hdfs

#### Q29. Which library should you use to perform ETL-type MapReduce jobs?

- %OPTION% Hive
- %OPTION% Pig
- %OPTION% Impala
- %OPTION% Mahout

#### Q30. What is the output of the Reducer?

- %OPTION% a relational table
- %OPTION% an update to the input file
- %OPTION% a single, combined list
- %OPTION% a set of <key, value> pairs

`map function processes a certain key-value pair and emits a certain number of key-value pairs and the Reduce function processes values grouped by the same key and emits another set of key-value pairs as output.`

#### Q31. To optimize a Mapper, what should you perform first?

- %OPTION% Override the default Partitioner.
- %OPTION% Skip bad records.
- %OPTION% Break up Mappers that do more than one task into multiple Mappers.
- %OPTION% Combine Mappers that do one task into large Mappers.

#### Q32. When implemented on a public cloud, with what does Hadoop processing interact?

- %OPTION% files in object storage
- %OPTION% graph data in graph databases
- %OPTION% relational data in managed RDBMS systems
- %OPTION% JSON data in NoSQL databases

#### Q33. In the Hadoop system, what administrative mode is used for maintenance?

- %OPTION% data mode
- %OPTION% safe mode
- %OPTION% single-user mode
- %OPTION% pseudo-distributed mode

#### Q34. In what format does RecordWriter write an output file?

- %OPTION% <key, value> pairs
- %OPTION% keys
- %OPTION% values
- %OPTION% <value, key> pairs

#### Q35. To what does the Mapper map input key/value pairs?

- %OPTION% an average of keys for values
- %OPTION% a sum of keys for values
- %OPTION% a set of intermediate key/value pairs
- %OPTION% a set of final key/value pairs

#### Q36. Which Hive query returns the first 1,000 values?

- %OPTION% SELECT…WHERE value = 1000
- %OPTION% SELECT … LIMIT 1000
- %OPTION% SELECT TOP 1000 …
- %OPTION% SELECT MAX 1000…

#### Q37. To implement high availability, how many instances of the master node should you configure?

- %OPTION% one
- %OPTION% zero
- %OPTION% shared
- %OPTION% two or more (https://data-flair.training/blogs/hadoop-high-availability-tutorial)

#### Q38. Hadoop 2.x and later implement which service as the resource coordinator?

- %OPTION% kubernetes
- %OPTION% JobManager
- %OPTION% JobTracker
- %OPTION% YARN

#### Q39. In MapReduce, **\_** have \_

- %OPTION% tasks; jobs
- %OPTION% jobs; activities
- %OPTION% jobs; tasks
- %OPTION% activities; tasks

#### Q40. What type of software is Hadoop Common?

- %OPTION% database
- %OPTION% distributed computing framework
- %OPTION% operating system
- %OPTION% productivity tool

#### Q41. If no reduction is desired, you should set the numbers of \_ tasks to zero

- %OPTION% combiner
- %OPTION% reduce
- %OPTION% mapper
- %OPTION% intermediate

#### Q42. MapReduce applications use which of these classes to report their statistics?

- %OPTION% mapper
- %OPTION% reducer
- %OPTION% combiner
- %OPTION% counter

#### Q43. \_ is the query language, and \_ is storage for NoSQL on Hadoop

- %OPTION% HDFS; HQL
- %OPTION% HQL; HBase
- %OPTION% HDFS; SQL
- %OPTION% SQL; HBase

#### Q44. MapReduce 1.0 \_ YARN

- %OPTION% does not include
- %OPTION% is the same thing as
- %OPTION% includes
- %OPTION% replaces

#### Q45. Which type of Hadoop node executes file system namespace operations like opening, closing, and renaming files and directories?

- %OPTION% ControllerNode
- %OPTION% DataNode
- %OPTION% MetadataNode
- %OPTION% NameNode

#### Q46. HQL queries produce which job types?

- %OPTION% Impala
- %OPTION% MapReduce
- %OPTION% Spark
- %OPTION% Pig

#### Q48. In a MapReduce job, which phase runs after the Map phase completes?

- %OPTION% Combiner
- %OPTION% Reducer
- %OPTION% Map2
- %OPTION% Shuffle and Sort

#### Q49. Where would you configure the size of a block in a Hadoop environment?

- %OPTION% dfs.block.size in hdfs-site.xmls
- %OPTION% orc.write.variable.length.blocks in hive-default.xml
- %OPTION% mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxbytes in mapred-site.xml
- %OPTION% hdfs.block.size in hdfs-site.xml

#### Q50. Hadoop systems are **\_** RDBMS systems.

- %OPTION% replacements for
- %OPTION% not used with
- %OPTION% substitutes for
- %OPTION% additions for

#### Q51. Which object can be used to distribute jars or libraries for use in MapReduce tasks?

- %OPTION% distributed cache
- %OPTION% library manager
- %OPTION% lookup store
- %OPTION% registry

#### Q52. To view the execution details of an Impala query plan, which function would you use ?

- %OPTION% explain
- %OPTION% query action
- %OPTION% detail
- %OPTION% query plan

#### Q53. Which feature is used to roll back a corrupted HDFS instance to a previously known good point in time?

- %OPTION% partitioning
- %OPTION% snapshot
- %OPTION% replication
- %OPTION% high availability

[Reference](https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r1.2.1/hdfs_design.html#:~:text=is%20not%20supported.-,Snapshots,known%20good%20point%20in%20time.)

#### Q54. Hadoop Common is written in which language?

- %OPTION% C++
- %OPTION% C
- %OPTION% Haskell
- %OPTION% Java

#### Q55. Which file system does Hadoop use for storage?

- %OPTION% NAS
- %OPTION% FAT
- %OPTION% HDFS
- %OPTION% NFS

#### Q56. What kind of storage and processing does Hadoop support?

- %OPTION% encrypted
- %OPTION% verified
- %OPTION% distributed
- %OPTION% remote

#### Q57. Hadoop Common consists of which components?

- %OPTION% Spark and YARN
- %OPTION% HDFS and MapReduce
- %OPTION% HDFS and S3
- %OPTION% Spark and MapReduce

#### Q58. Most Apache Hadoop committers' work is done at which commercial company?

- %OPTION% Cloudera
- %OPTION% Microsoft
- %OPTION% Google
- %OPTION% Amazon

#### Q59. To get information about Reducer job runs, which object should be added?

- %OPTION% Reporter
- %OPTION% IntReadable
- %OPTION% IntWritable
- %OPTION% Writer

#### Q60. After changing the default block size and restarting the cluster, to which data does the new size apply?

- %OPTION% all data
- %OPTION% no data
- %OPTION% existing data
- %OPTION% new data

#### Q61. Which statement should you add to improve the performance of the following query?

```
SELECT
  c.id,
  c.name,
  c.email_preferences.categories.surveys
FROM customers c;
```

- %OPTION% GROUP BY
- %OPTION% FILTER
- %OPTION% SUB-SELECT
- %OPTION% SORT

#### Q62. What custom object should you implement to reduce IO in MapReduce?

- %OPTION% Comparator
- %OPTION% Mapper
- %OPTION% Combiner
- %OPTION% Reducer

#### Q63. You can optimize Hive queries using which method?

- %OPTION% secondary indices
- %OPTION% summary statistics
- %OPTION% column-based statistics
- %OPTION% a primary key index

#### Q64. If you are processing a single action on each input, what type of job should you create?

- %OPTION% partition-only
- %OPTION% map-only
- %OPTION% reduce-only
- %OPTION% combine-only

#### Q65. The simplest possible MapReduce job optimization is to perform which of these actions?

- %OPTION% Add more master nodes.
- %OPTION% Implement optimized InputSplits.
- %OPTION% Add more DataNodes.
- %OPTION% Implement a custom Mapper.

#### Q66. When you implement a custom Writable, you must also define which of these object?

- %OPTION% a sort policy
- %OPTION% a combiner policy
- %OPTION% a compression policy
- %OPTION% a filter policy

#### Q67. To copy a file into the Hadoop file system, what command should you use?

- %OPTION% hadoop fs -copy <fromDir> <toDir>
- %OPTION% hadoop fs -copy <toDir> <fromDir>
- %OPTION% hadoop fs -copyFromLocal <fromDir> <toDir>
- %OPTION% hadoop fs -copyFromLocal <toDir> <fromDir>

#### Q68. delete a Hive ______ table and you will delete the table ______.
    
- %OPTION% managed; metadata
- %OPTION% external; data and metadata
- %OPTION% external; metadata
- %OPTION% managed; data

#### Q69. To see how Hive executed a JOIN operation, use the _ statement and look for the ____ value.
- %OPTION% EXPLAIN; JOIN Operator
- %OPTION% QUERY; MAP JOIN Operator
- %OPTION% EXPLAIN; MAP JOIN Operator
- %OPTION% QUERY; JOIN Operator

en.TITLE: Skill Assessments Quizzes
en.DESC:
Collection of questions and answers on different subjects aimed to help
you test your knowledge before an important job interview!

Data from __data__. UI by __bandinopla__

es.TITLE: Questionarios de evaluación de habilidades
es.DESC:
Colección de preguntas y respuestas sobre diferentes temas orientadas a
ayudarte a testear tu conocimiento antes de una importante entrevista de trabajo! 

Datos de __data__. UI por __bandinopla__
